text: Naye ate amazima bwe gaamala okubajjira okuva gye tuli baagamba nti singa aweereddwa nga ebyaweebwa Musa (naye) abaffe tebaawakanya ebyo ebyaweebwa Musa oluberyeberye ne bagamba nti (ebigambo bya Musa ne Muhammad) byombi ddogo, erimu liyamba linnaalyo era ne bagamba nti mazima ffe tuwakanya buli kyonna ekigwa mu kiti ky'ebyo
